All original packing must be included. #Up for Sale is a 2018 Jackson Soloist SLATTXMG3-6! EMG Active Pickups! Black Satin Finish! This is really cool. You are looking at a 2018 Jackson Soloist SLATTXMG3-6. EMG active humbucking pickups, Floyd Rose Special Tremolo. Perfect Dive Bombing Shredder Guitar. From The Web: Built for speed and serious tone, Jackson's Soloist SLATTXMGQ3-6 solidbody electric guitar gives you the performance of a traditional Jackson shredding machine for a fraction of the price. Featuring a comfortable mahogany body and a clean, simple layout, this axe lets you connect with your music and really focus on your technique. Its neck-through-body design gives you tons of sustain, and its compound-radius fingerboard lets you easily transition from chord work to high-throttle shredding. Jackson Soloist SLATTXMGQ3-6 Solidbody Electric Guitar at a Glance:Compound-radius fingerboard gives you the best of both worlds Neck-through design and EMG active pickups for incredible tone and sustain Your weapon of choice for menacing tone and wicked good looks One name is synonymous with the utmost in high-performance guitar design—Jackson, the progenitor of all musical speed machines. Conceived as a launching platform for technically advanced guitar playing, the X Series Soloist™ SLATXMG3-6 is rife with Jackson’s bloodline—sophisticated ergonomic design, ultra-fast playability and, of course, monstrous tone. Dual graphite reinforcement rods run the length of the maple neck with speed profile to fortify it against the extremes of nature, buttressing it against warping while a fast 12”-16” compound radius fingerboard creates the ideal playing surface for fat riffs and easy chording near the black plastic nut while gradually flattening in the upper registers for lightning-quick solos and wide bends without fear of fretting out. A pair of EMG active humbucking pickups—an 85 neck pickup and 81 bridge pickup—generate versatile, huge and high output tones for brutal distortion and clear, crisp cleans, while the Floyd Rose® Special bridge provides excellent vibrato with tuning stability. Classic Jackson appointments include the instantly recognizable piranha inlays, black hardware, single-ply neck binding and the Soloist’s ergonomically arched top for playing blazing licks with comfort. Sleek, refined, and dangerous, the SLATXMG3-6 Soloist is art brought to life, tempered with high-tech performance for the ultimate metal machine. Stand Out From The Crowd!
